articles.title: President Trump Threatens Legal Action Against Wall Street Journal Over Epstein Report
articles.description: President Donald Trump has threatened to sue the Wall Street Journal following a report alleging his contribution of a drawing to Jeffrey Epstein's birthday album in 2003. Trump denies the claim and has ordered the release of related grand jury testimony.

articles.title: House Passes Bill to Reclaim $9 Billion from Foreign Aid and Public Broadcasting
articles.description: The House of Representatives voted 216 to 213 in favor of President Trump's rescissions package, aiming to retract $9 billion in previously approved funding for foreign aid and public broadcasting. The bill now awaits the President's signature.

articles.title: CBS Announces End of 'The Late Show with Stephen Colbert' in 2026
articles.description: CBS has announced that 'The Late Show with Stephen Colbert' will conclude in May 2026, citing financial reasons unrelated to performance or content. Colbert expressed gratitude to his audience and plans to remain for one final season.
